description:
My place is in hip and fun Park Slope. Try some of the best restaurants, take a stroll up the slope to Prospect Park, shop in boutique stores, and best of all - you are 30 seconds away from 9th street/4th avenue subway station (R & F lines).  You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the outdoors space, the neighborhood, the comfy bed, and the light. We have a beautiful yard which is great for people-watching. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Spend time in a Park Slope, Brooklyn home that was built in 1899! This studio has all the basics you need for a great trip: wifi, working stove, dishes, table/chair, small couch, and lovely front yard to sit out and relax.

You'll have private access to your studio unit, of course, but you may also use the front yard to sit and people-watch, have some coffee, or read a good book.

Roger will meet you to hand over keys at agreed-upon time. If you have any other questions, just let him know.

Park Slope is rated as one of the most sought after real estate areas in the nation. Spend time in this unique 19th century home during your trip to NYC.

We are conveniently located within a 1 minute walk from the R train at 9th street, and the F train at 4th Ave-9th street.
name: Spacious Studio Apt.,  1 minute from R & F trains
review: Roger's is place is basic, but clean and in a great location. Communication with Roger was excellent and check in and out was simple and straight forward. It's a great place to stay if you just want a place to sleep after exploring NY.
